column1: '''LAW''' (also appearing in the extended form '''LAWAR''') is a [[Primitive Quendian]] [[Sundocarme|root]] signifying the golden colour.<ref>{{PE|Eldarin}}

column2: ''lávar'' ("(golden) blossom"); ''[[laurë|laure]]'' ("golden colour of sunshine or golden flowers")

column1: In the ''Qenya Lexicon'' appear the roots LAURE ("gold") and LAWA ("have life...but used of a vegetable").<ref>{{PE|12}}</ref>
In the ''[[The Etymologies|Etymologies]]'' appears the roots LÁWAR- ([[Noldorin]] alteration: GLÁWAR-)
column2: from which derives Primitive Quendian *''laurē'' ("(light of the golden Tree ''[[Laurelin]]'') gold [the colour
